scripts.postinstall: if [ $(echo $NODE_ENV) == 'production' ]; then npm install git+ssh://git@gitlab.com:kevincolten/yosql.git#cf1e0e41; fi && npm rebuild && npm run favicon && npm run gulp build
scripts.favicon-inject-austin: echo '' > views/favicon-austin.pug && real-favicon inject faviconData.json public/favicons/austin views/favicon-austin.pug && mv public/favicons/austin/favicon-austin.pug views/favicon-austin.pug
scripts.favicon-inject-sanantonio: echo '' > views/favicon-sanantonio.pug && real-favicon inject faviconData.json public/favicons/sanantonio views/favicon-sanantonio.pug && mv public/favicons/sanantonio/favicon-sanantonio.pug views/favicon-sanantonio.pug
scripts.favicon-inject-dallas: echo '' > views/favicon-dallas.pug && real-favicon inject faviconData.json public/favicons/dallas views/favicon-dallas.pug && mv public/favicons/dallas/favicon-dallas.pug views/favicon-dallas.pug
scripts.favicon-inject-houston: echo '' > views/favicon-houston.pug && real-favicon inject faviconData.json public/favicons/houston views/favicon-houston.pug && mv public/favicons/houston/favicon-houston.pug views/favicon-houston.pug
scripts.favicon-austin: real-favicon generate _favicon_austin.json faviconData.json public/favicons/austin && npm run favicon-inject-austin
scripts.favicon-sanantonio: real-favicon generate _favicon_sanantonio.json faviconData.json public/favicons/sanantonio && npm run favicon-inject-sanantonio
scripts.favicon-dallas: real-favicon generate _favicon_dallas.json faviconData.json public/favicons/dallas && npm run favicon-inject-dallas
scripts.favicon-houston: real-favicon generate _favicon_houston.json faviconData.json public/favicons/houston && npm run favicon-inject-houston
scripts.favicon: npm run favicon-austin && npm run favicon-sanantonio && npm run favicon-dallas && npm run favicon-houston
